alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 11:39PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, Portage and southern Marathon Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1139 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Mosinee to 12 miles northeast of Millston. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mosinee around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Babcock and Bevent. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
